about_the_game:
Dissatisfied with the taxes the empire is imposing, Miru, the mayor of Tisryle, activates the engines beneath her city and takes to the skies! Not wanting other cities to follow her example, the council that rules the empire immediately sends their armies to destroy Tisryle. Miru must build her forces, recruit new allies, and most importantly, make a whole ton of money if she wants to stand a chance.

As the acting mayor of Tisryle, it is your job to manage the city's resources. You can purchase and upgrade items, build up industry, and much more. You are also in charge of defending the city. As enemies approach, you will choose a line-up of fighters, equip them with your best weapons, and send them out to fight. From common bandits to imperial goons, can you defeat all those who would take away your freedoms?

Gripping Storyline

There's more than just building a flying city. Dive into the interactions between characters and personally experience the twists and turns in this gripping story.

Combinations Galore!

With over a hundred weapons and items and over fifteen characters, each with their own unique active and passive skills, you can create your dream team by exploring all the combinations you can find!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP/2000
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
